by_category.Retail: In retail, we tracked 2 stories and themes like inside, victoria’s, secret’s. Example: “Inside Victoria’s Secret’s new DC store”.
by_category.eCommerce: In ecommerce, we tracked 2 stories and themes like trends, people, abandon. Example: “Ecommerce Trends: Why people abandon carts”.
by_category.AI: In ai, we tracked 4 stories and themes like ai, holiday, one-third. Example: “One-third of consumers plan to use AI for holiday shopping”.
by_category.Supply Chain: In supply chain, we tracked 5 stories with attention on Amazon and themes like supply, chain, shipping. Example: “Top supply chain conferences to keep on your radar in 2026”.
by_category.Big Box: In big box, we tracked 5 stories with attention on Home Depot, Walmart and themes like home, depot, digital. Example: “Target shareholder group proposes independent board chair policy”.
by_category.Other: In other, we tracked 12 stories with attention on Nike and themes like tariff, uncertainty, former. Example: “Former Macy’s merchant heads to Five Below”.
